events.blurb: Thursday Morning people are talking about the Potters.
events.description:
* "Tiny old man" with a "squeaky voice that made passersby stare" - probably
  [Flitwick].
* people with cloaks on street corners.

[Flitwick]: <../people/flitwick/filus/>
events.source:
Mrs. J. K. Rowling. _[Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone]_
Page 5. Text copyright © 1998 

[Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone]: https://www.librarything.com/work/5403381

events.description:
[Hagrid] says he flew over Bristol. There is very very little of the West Country in 
which Godric's Hollow could be located for Bristol to be between it and Surrey.  
Instead, Bristol seems to indicate a detour to the north, or a point of origin in Wales.

[Hagrid]: <../people/hagrid/rubeus/>
events.source:
Mrs. J. K. Rowling. _[Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone]_
Page 15. Text copyright © 1998

events.description:
[Dumbledore] arrives at "nearly Midnight" which means that [Harry] was found by [Petunia]
on the Morning of the 2st.

[Dumbledore]: <../people/dumbledore/albus_percival_wulfric_brian/>

[Harry]: <../people/potter/harry_james/>

[Petunia]: <../people/evans/petunia/>
